location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Photographic print with additions in pen and inkDimensions:458 x 467 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings and isolines.An enlarged photographic copy of a nautical chart dated 25 August 1933 and reviewed 5 October 1933, with title, dates and annotation inserted in hand at the bottom right-hand corner.Shows the waters north of Bahrain and Qatar Peninsula with additions in red indicating the positions of buoys.
